class_utils module

class_utils.get_all_parent_classes(subclass)
class_utils.modify_class(obj, new_class, inplace=False)

Parses the object into given class. If not in place, will return a new object.

Parameters:
  • obj (any) – the object to be parsed
  • new_class (type) – the new class
  • inplace (bool) – if False, will return a copy
Returns:

the object with new type class or nothing
Return type:

new_class or None
class_utils.share_parent_class(class_1, class_2)
